itemDisplayName: VM Scale Set Configuration managed by Azure Automation
description: Deploy a VM Scale Set where virtual machines are deployed as registered nodes in the Azure Automation Desired State Configuration service, and node configuration is guaranteed consistency after deployment. NOTE: The DSC configuration module requires three specific Azure Automation DSC parameters: Registration Key, Registration URL, and Configuration Function. These prerequisites are available only after successful creation and configuration of an Azure Automation Account for Azure Automation DSC.
summary: This template deploys a VM Scale Set and registers the virtual machines in Azure Automation DSC.
